data.title: Summit County death notices
data.meta_description: The following is the remaining list of the Ohio Department of Health death notices for February. Audra C. Pratt, Cuyahoga Falls, Feb. 26, 1948 to Jan. 31, 2024 John R. Prochaska, Copley, Oct. 5, 1957 to Feb. 16, 2024 Willie J. Pryor, Akron, Sept. 26, 1957 to Feb. 6, 2024 Shirley S. Pumphrey, Green, Nov.
